## Project Overview
Modern eCommerce website for Royal Artisanat - selling handcrafted artisan women's bags made in Tunisia.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- TailwindCSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- JWT for authentication
- LocalStorage for cart persistence

## Design Guidelines
- Elegant, warm color palette with artisan-inspired accents (warm earth tones, gold accents)
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Responsive design (desktop, tablet, mobile)
- Sophisticated, artisanal aesthetic with French-Tunisian influence

## Project Structure
- Pages: Home, Shop, Product Details, Cart, Checkout, Auth, About, Contact
- Components: Navbar, Footer, ProductCard, Auth forms
- Features: Product filtering, search, cart system, user authentication
- Animations: Elegant fade-ins, smooth hover effects, artisan-inspired transitions

## Development Notes
- Use TypeScript interfaces for all data structures
- Implement proper error handling
- Ensure SEO-friendly structure
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Use modern React patterns (hooks, context)
